mapper.select: SELECT distinct p.pro_num as pro_num,pro_name,pro_content,pro_answer,tag_name,p.user_id as user_id, avg(pro_eval_score) over(partition by e.pro_num) as score from pro_eval e full outer join problem p on e.pro_num = p.pro_num WHERE p.category_name = #{category} order by pro_num DESC

SELECT distinct p.pro_num as pro_num, max(h.history_date) over(partition by h.pro_num) as history_date, pro_name, tag_name ,p.user_id,category_name FROM problem p , user_pro_history h WHERE p.pro_num = h.pro_num and h.user_id = #{user_id} order by history_date DESC

select * from pro_collection
category_name = #{category} and col_tag = '창작'

SELECT col_num ,col_list_num, p.pro_num, pro_content, pro_answer, pro_comment, to_number(cho_num) as cho_num, cho_content FROM col_list l, problem p, pro_choice c WHERE l.pro_num = p.pro_num and l.pro_num = c.pro_num and l.col_num = #{col_num} union all select col_num ,col_list_num, p.pro_num, pro_content, pro_answer, pro_comment, p.pro_num, to_char(p.pro_num) from col_list l, problem p where l.pro_num = p.pro_num and l.col_num = #{col_num} and p.tag_ischoice = 'N' order by col_list_num asc, cho_num asc
